thread.title: Major delays hit commuters as trains cancelled
thread.title_full: Major delays hit commuters as trains cancelled

title: Major delays hit commuters as trains cancelled
text:
Train travellers are facing severe delays in Hampshire this morning. 
There are no trains running on the rail link between Romsey and Salisbury. 
The cause of the hold up has been blamed on over-running engineering works on the line. 
Commuters using trains put on by First Great Western and South West Trains are affected. Share article 
There are not expected to be any trains until at least 8.30am this morning. 
No trains run between Romsey and Salisbury   Keep in touch with local news
